name: Fingies
description:
Fingies

A game about fingers. Yeah.

[Game length ⁓5mins] [Sound ON!]

[Submission for GDKO23 Round 3]

Controls:
  • WASD - Move
  • Left Mouse Click - Single Shoot
  • Right Mouse Click - Charge Shot
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • Left Shift Key - Sprint
Developer Notes

This game is currently being patched up for a better experience! I've gathered enough feedback that warrants a proper update so any future players can have a better experience :) If there are any more bugs you find please leave a comment and I'll get to it as soon as I can! Keep an eye out for the next update!

Known bugs:

  • Joystick sensitivity is too high.
  • Boss fight collisions and attack collisions not working as intended.
  • Sprint not working as intended, too jittery.
This game was made using the Unity engine for GDKO2023 Round 3.
Audio assets were used from the god Kenny himself @ https://www.kenney.nl/assets 
Finger title image by gstudioimagen1 on Freepik
